class.name: GeneticAlgorithmTestBinary

javadoc.text: This is also an example of usage.

method.name: test
method.comment: to test a stochastic algorithm is hard, so this will rather be an usage example
all selected chromosomes will be recombined (=crosssover)
best chromosome from the final population
the only thing we can test is whether the final solution is not worse than the initial one
however, for some implementations of GA, this need not be true :)

javadoc.text: Chromosomes represented by a binary chromosome. * The goal is to set all bits (genes) to 1.
